content.question: The artist of the painting shown used which of the following techniques in the scene depicted?

choices.label: Atmospheric perspective through the inclusion of cool colors in the background
Tenebrism through the inclusion of contrasting light and dark areas
One-point perspective through the inclusion of a single vanishing point
Symmetrical balance through the inclusion of a central axis to divide the composition

content.answer: Atmospheric perspective through the inclusion of cool colors in the background

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
